title: In-memory Engine: `new_region_meta` assert fails
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

https://github.com/tikv/tikv/blob/aae579368c75e306e5012029d58e20f0158b4a05/components/range_cache_memory_engine/src/range_manager.rs#L290-L302

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

aae579368c75e306e5012029d58e20f0158b4a05, a custom build based on 8a75d3b22.

<!--

### Steps to reproduce

Run sysbench many delete mvcc workload.

-->

### What did you expect?

No panic.

### What did happened?

Panic.
